entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Haldimand County
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, 4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Hamilton Munro Int'l Airport 12:00 PM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 101.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 1.2 km
Humidity: 100 %

Wind: N 2 km/h

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy or drizzle. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Drizzle or showers changing to rain at times heavy this afternoon. Fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain at times heavy or snow. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow near midnight. Rainfall amount 10 to 15 mm. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 11:14 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 2.
